name: Pathmaker (itch)
description:
A short puzzlescript game about creating and connecting cubes together to make a path.

Mobile friendly version: https://www.puzzlescript.net/play.html?p=c5cb6df0e018247035f784c6b4841c25

source code: https://www.puzzlescript.net/editor.html?hack=c5cb6df0e018247035f784c6b4841c25
